metadata.methodology: Comprehensive extraction of ALL ML models/techniques mentioned

models.name: Hidden Markov Model (HMM) for Regime Detection
models.paper_source: Multiple sources - QuantStart tutorials, hmmlearn library
limitations: Can suffer from local optima in EM algorithm

models.name: Gaussian Mixture Model (GMM) for Volatility Clustering
key_features: Fast - no iterative forward-backward like HMM

models.name: K-Means to HMM Hybrid (Zero-Shot Adaptation)
key_features: Avoids local optima in EM algorithm

models.name: Triple Barrier Labeling
models.paper_source: López de Prado (2018) - Advances in Financial Machine Learning

models.name: Meta-labeling
key_features: Predicts when primary model will be correct

models.name: Hawkes Process for Order Flow Imbalance
Sub-linear Position Sizing (Giller Formula)
models.paper_source: Graham Giller - The 10 Most Important Things

models.name: Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) for Non-linear State Estimation
Unscented Kalman Filter (UKF)
models.accuracy: Better than EKF for highly non-linear systems

models.name: Particle Filter for OFI
models.accuracy: Good for non-Gaussian, but computationally expensive

models.name: GARCH (Generalized Autoregressive Conditional Heteroskedasticity)
models.accuracy: Good for volatility clustering, but assumes Gaussian residuals
limitations: User preference: EXCLUDED from priority list

models.name: EMD + GMM (Empirical Mode Decomposition)
key_features: Decomposes price into intrinsic mode functions

models.name: CNN AutoEncoder for Regime Detection
key_features: Detects 2008 GFC and COVID-19 periods effectively

models.name: Random Forest for Meta-labeling
key_features: Predicts when primary model is correct
Robust to overfitting with proper tuning

models.name: Fractional Differentiation
models.paper_source: López de Prado (2018) - AFML, fracdiff library
key_features: Makes series stationary while preserving memory

models.name: Cointegration-based Pairs Trading (Engle-Granger)
key_features: Academic gold standard for pairs trading

models.name: Hurst Exponent for Mean Reversion Detection
Genetic Algorithm (GA) for Triple Barrier Optimization
key_features: Optimizes profit target / stop loss ratio

models.name: Hierarchical Risk Parity (HRP)
models.paper_source: López de Prado (2020) - Machine Learning for Asset Managers

models.name: Regime-Switching LGCC (Local Gaussian Correlation)
key_features: Local Gaussian Correlation for regime-specific dependencies
Captures lower tail dependence in bear markets

models.name: Visibility Graph + GMM Optimization
models.paper_source: Optimization of GMMs on Visibility Graphs (2023) - DOI:10.1007/s10287-023-00460-4
key_features: Encodes time series as visibility graphs
Uses graph structure for EM initialization

models.name: Wasserstein Clustering for Regime Detection
models.paper_source: Medium: From HMM to Wasserstein Clustering
key_features: Better than Euclidean distance for distributions

models.name: Path Signature Methods
key_features: Represents time series as paths in signature space

models.name: Volume Order Imbalance (VOI)
models.accuracy: Good predictor of short-term price movement
limitations: Can be noisy on low liquidity

models.name: Deep Order Flow Imbalance (Deep OFI)
models.paper_source: Deep Order Flow Imbalance (2024) - Semantic Scholar
models.accuracy: Alpha at multiple time horizons (tick to minute)

models.name: Market States + State Machines (Probabilistic Transition Matrix)
models.accuracy: Captures skewness, kurtosis better than traditional
key_features: Cluster returns based on momentum + risk
Gaussian mixture weighted by state frequencies
limitations: Transition matrix can change over time

models.name: Finite Mixture Models for Multiscale Dynamics
Student-t Distribution for Non-Gaussian Returns
models.accuracy: Better than Gaussian for fat tails

models.name: Lévy Processes for Asset Returns
models.accuracy: Better than Gaussian for fat tails + jumps

models.name: Kaniadakis Non-Gaussian Option Pricing
models.accuracy: Better than Black-Scholes for fat tails

models.name: Fractional Brownian Motion for Kurtosis Modeling
QMLE (Quasi-Maximum Likelihood Estimation) for Non-Gaussian GARCH
models.paper_source: Fat Tails and Asymmetry in Volatility Models (2004)
models.accuracy: Better than MLE for non-Gaussian residuals

models.name: OPTICS Clustering for Pairs Trading
key_features: No need to specify number of clusters

models.name: LSTM vs HMM Comparison for Stock Forecasting
models.accuracy: HMM demonstrates strong long-term trend capture
limitations: Not a new model - just comparison

models.name: Support Vector Regression (SVR) vs HMM
limitations: Not a new model - just comparison

models.name: Hierarchical Clustering for Regime Detection
key_features: No need to specify number of clusters upfront

optional: PyTorch - Transformer, CNN, DRL (if GPU available)
